players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Diana: "Bob was killed last night, so we need to focus on finding the detective quickly before they investigate again. I suggest we watch for suspicious behavior carefully."
You: "Diana is the mafioso. I have proof from my investigation last night."
Charlie: "I think Alice is the mafioso. She had proof from her investigation, and Bob was found dead last night."
You: "Alice is telling the truth; Diana is the mafioso. Charlie is trying to mislead us. We should vote to arrest Diana now to protect the town."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
